name: Lode Runner +
overview: An early update to Lode Runner prior to the CSDb plus system that added a menu of choices as to the levels to run you would like to run. Choices were the original Professional Loderunner 1-75 levels, Professional Loderunner 2 and the 76-150 levels there, Loderunner Championship, Loderunner 5 and Loadrunner Classic.
